scripts.test:register: cd server; npm run test register
scripts.test:login: cd server; npm run test login
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run tsw && node ./dist/index.js" "cd client && npm run serve"
scripts.install: cd server; npm i --verbose; cd ../client; npm i --verbose
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client; npm run build; cd ../server; npm start
